entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with flurries and snow squalls beginning after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
